page.title: 13The Great Barford Milkman.
page.content: My dad is the Great Barford milkman. He gets up at 5.00am and drives to the depot in Bedford in his car.He collects his milk float and drives back to Barford.He starts his round at about 6.00am.He delivers to 400 houses,leaving fruit juice,fizzy drinks,bread,eggs,potatoes and five different kinds of milk. He finishes his round at 11.oo and goes back to Bedford. On the way back he writes out the goods he will need for next day into a note book. When he gets back he unloads all the empty bottles. Then he goes into the ordering room and orders what is required for the following day. He fixes the recharger in to the battery on the milk float. He goes back in the car and finishes at about 12.00.
